Markus, I could just add a null check. But I wonder where this node is coming from.

I guess this is due to "workspace" refactorings like rename project, which end up in a .workspace directory in the .metadata, and are treated "specially" (not necessary correctly) in BrowseRefactoringHistoryContentProvider...
